questions.question: What is your full name?
What is your email address?

questions.field_name: Name of School Recommending STEM OPT
questions.question: What is the name of the school recommending your STEM OPT?

questions.field_name: Name of School Where STEM Degree Was Earned
questions.question: What is the name of the school where you earned your STEM degree?

questions.field_name: SEVIS School Code of School Recommending STEM OPT
questions.question: What is the SEVIS school code (including 3-digit suffix) of the school recommending your STEM OPT?

questions.field_name: Designated School Official (DSO) Name and Contact Information
questions.question: What are the name and contact information of your Designated School Official (DSO)?
What is the requested period for your STEM OPT (From date to To date in mm-dd-yyyy format)?

questions.field_name: Qualifying Major and Classification of Instructional Programs (CIP) Code
questions.question: What is your qualifying major and the Classification of Instructional Programs (CIP) code?
What is the level/type of your qualifying degree?
What is the date your degree was awarded (in mm-dd-yyyy format)?
Is your STEM OPT based on a prior degree (Yes or No)?
What is your Employment Authorization Number?
What is your employer's name?
What is your employer's street address?
What is your employer's website URL?
In which city is your employer located?
In which state is your employer located?
What is your employer's ZIP Code?
What is your employer's ID number (EIN)?

questions.field_name: Number of Full-Time Employees in U.S.
questions.question: How many full-time employees does your employer have in the U.S.?

questions.field_name: North American Industry Classification System (NAICS) Code
questions.question: What is your employer's North American Industry Classification System (NAICS) code?
How many OPT hours per week are you scheduled to work (must be at least 20 hours/week)?
What is your employer's name?
What is the site name?
What is the site address (Street, City, State, ZIP)?
Describe your role with the employer and how that role is directly related to enhancing your knowledge obtained through your qualifying STEM degree.

Describe the assignment(s) your employer has given you that will help you achieve your specific objectives for work-based learning related to your STEM degree. Include your specific goals regarding knowledge, skills, or techniques, and how you will achieve them.

Explain how your employer provides oversight and supervision of individuals filling positions such as the one you are filling. If a training program or related policy is in place that controls oversight and supervision, please describe.

Explain how your employer measures and confirms whether individuals filling positions at their organization are acquiring new knowledge and skills. If there is a training program or related policy detailing such measures and assessments, please describe.
What is the start date for the evaluation period?
What is the end date for the evaluation period?
Please provide your signature for the self-evaluation.
What is your printed name?
What is the date of your signature?
Please provide the signature of the employer official with signatory authority.
What is the printed name of the employer official with signatory authority?
What is the date of the employer's signature?
What is the start date for the final evaluation period?
What is the end date for the final evaluation period?
Please provide your signature for the final self-evaluation.
What is your printed name for the final evaluation?
What is the date of your signature for the final evaluation?
Please provide the signature of the employer official with signatory authority for the final evaluation.
What is the printed name of the employer official with signatory authority for the final evaluation?
What is the date of the employer's signature for the final evaluation?
